name: viral-story-search-monorepo
description: Viral Story Search - Next.js frontend with Python FastAPI backend

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && ./run.sh" "cd viral-story-search && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:test: cd backend && python setup_test_data.py && cd .. && npm run dev
scripts.kill: lsof -ti:8000,3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; echo 'Servers stopped (data preserved)'
scripts.stop: lsof -ti:8000,3000 | xargs kill -9; rm -f backend/data/*.json; rm -rf backend/cache/images/*
